CustomField.description: Created for when a user is on the Terms & Conditions page in UDC to opt into social media. This field will be updated to checked when the community user accepts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Created for when a user is on the Terms & Conditions page in UDC to opt into social media. This field will be updated to checked when the community user accepts.
CustomField.label: Opt Into Social Media
